name: 吳昭正
objective:
學習 C 語言的用法，包括：變數、表示式、敘述、形態宣告、 控制結構、函式、陣列、指標、結構、檔案處理、及格式化輸出 / 輸入等用法，以作業及期末專題強化學習效果。
Learn C programming, including: usage of variable, expression, statement, type declaration, control structure, function, array, pointer, structure, file processing, and formatted I/O. In this course, assignments and term projects will be emphasized to strengthen the learning.
materials:
主要教材：由片語學習 C 程式設計（第二版）, 劉邦 著，國立臺灣大學出版中心，2019.
參考教材：
1. C Programming Language, 2nd edition, by Kernighan Brian W. and Ritchie Dennis, Pearson, 1988.
2. C++ Primer, 5th edition, by Stanley Lippman, Josée Lajoie, and Barbara Moo, Addison-Wesley Professional, 2012.
3. Beginning C++ Through Game Programming, 4th edition, by Michael Dawson, Cengage Learning PTR, 2014.
